I installed Carla by Quick Installation 0.9.9.3. And install carla-ros-bridge as developers. When I try to test ros-bridge through roslaunch carla_ros_bridge carla_ros_bridge_with_example_ego_vehicle.launch. Some errors occur as follows <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44232865/85355145-8a3bdc00-b53e-11ea-8f54-ea09c3446127.png></denchmark-link>
How can I fix it? Thank you! Thank you!

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/joel-mb>@joel-mb</denchmark-link> could you please ask for further information and take a look at this issue?

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/shizhuocaoa>@shizhuocaoa</denchmark-link> , Can you provide more information about your setup? Is the manual control (without using ROS) working? Try running the script provided inside . Please, take a look to the solution of this similar issue also (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/carla-simulator/carla/issues/991>#991</denchmark-link> ).
I seemed have met the same problem,u can try change to install new pygame version using "pip install " rather than "apt".

Installing pygame using "install" solved my issue too! I used the following command: python2 -m pip install -U pygame --user Then running manual_control.py using python2.7 rather than python3.6. With python3.6, I am getting ImportError even when running spawn_npc.py. However, with python2.7 it works fine.
